metadata.name: Is this role being posted for the immigration team?

title: Night Shift Pharmacist
content:
Our Opportunity:
Chewy is seeking a Night Shift Pharmacist to serve our "online neighborhood pharmacy" at our mail order pharmacy fulfillment center in Dallas, TX. Our facility is fully dedicated to service the needs of online pet parents and help them get what their veterinarian wants them to give their pet(s). As a Pharmacist for Chewy, you will be part of a team that is committed to providing outstanding care and wellness services for the pet parents and their pets. In this role, you will be an integral member of the pharmacy team. Your success will be driven by your ability to lead and foster a culture of continuous improvement, quality, and service.
What you’ll do:

You will be responsible for the interpretation and verification of medication orders
Review prescriber medication orders to identify possible dosing, scheduling, contraindication, allergy, drug interaction, and/or incompatibility problems.
Communicate with Veterinarians and their staff and Pet Parents as required.
Oversee and direct pharmacy technicians and interns. Provide ongoing training and coaching as needed.
Maintain necessary records to fulfill Federal and State legal requirements and pharmacy policies
Upholds operational standards including performance metrics, safety and compliance
Perform related duties and assignments as directed by management.
Position may require travel

What you’ll need:

Bachelor’s Degree in Pharmacy ( RPh ) or Doctor of Pharmacy ( PharmD )
Must have an active pharmacy license in the state of Texas with license in good standing
Strong customer services and attention to detail
Ability to lead a team
Ability to work in a fast paced environment
Ability to work a variety of schedules including, evenings, holidays, and weekends

 Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members. If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you need an accommodation during the application process or to perform these job requirements, or if you need a religious accommodation, please contact CAAR@chewy.com.
 
If you have a question regarding your application, please contact HR@chewy.com.
 
To access Chewy's Customer Privacy Policy, please click here. To access Chewy's California CPRA Job Applicant Privacy Policy, please click here.
